languages.text: Вентиляционная система все еще работает. На металлических пластинах видны странные борозды, словно от когтей животного, пытавшегося забраться в шахту.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Вентиляция все еще работает, видны следы влезания в вентиляцию

languages.text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.
languages.original_text: Вентиляционная система все еще работает. На металлических пластинах видны странные борозды, словно от когтей животного, пытавшегося забраться в шахту.

traits.locale_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.
The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.
The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.
The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

languages.text: 通风系统仍在工作，金属上有某些古怪的凹痕，看起来像是某种野兽试图爬进竖井时留下的爪痕。
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

traits.locale_text: 通风系统仍在工作，金属上有某些古怪的凹痕，看起来像是某种野兽试图爬进竖井时留下的爪痕。

languages.text: Le système de ventilation fonctionne toujours. Vous remarquez d'étranges entailles sur le métal : il semble avoir été déformé par les griffes d'une créature qui tentait de ramper dans le conduit.
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

traits.locale_text: Le système de ventilation fonctionne toujours. Vous remarquez d'étranges entailles sur le métal : il semble avoir été déformé par les griffes d'une créature qui tentait de ramper dans le conduit.

languages.text: 喚気システムはまだ作動している。金属には異様な削り痕がある。まるで一種の獣がシャフトに潜り込もうとした爪痕のようだ。
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

traits.locale_text: 喚気システムはまだ作動している。金属には異様な削り痕がある。まるで一種の獣がシャフトに潜り込もうとした爪痕のようだ。

languages.text: El sistema de ventilación sigue funcionando. El metal está lleno de extrañas muescas. Parecen las marcas de las garras de una bestia que intentaba entrar en el conducto.
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

traits.locale_text: El sistema de ventilación sigue funcionando. El metal está lleno de extrañas muescas. Parecen las marcas de las garras de una bestia que intentaba entrar en el conducto.

languages.text: Das Belüftungssystem funktioniert noch. Im Metall sind merkwürdige Spuren zu sehen: Sie wirken wir die Kratzer einer Bestie, die versucht hat, in den Schacht zu kriechen.
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.

traits.locale_text: Das Belüftungssystem funktioniert noch. Im Metall sind merkwürdige Spuren zu sehen: Sie wirken wir die Kratzer einer Bestie, die versucht hat, in den Schacht zu kriechen.

languages.text: Havalandırma sistemi hâlâ çalışıyor. Metalin üzerinde garip oyuklar var: Havalandırma boşluğunda sürünmeye çalışan bir yaratığın bıraktığı pençe izlerine benziyorlar.
languages.original_text: The ventilation system still works. There are strange gouges on the metal: they look like the claw marks of some beast that was trying to crawl into the shaft.
